answers.author: Michelle Bailey-Hedgepeth
answers.text:
http://www.cityofnorthlasvegas.com/Departments/Finance/PDFs/Budgets/2010_2011/Statistical_and_Glossary_2010_2011.pdf
See page 275 which list the salary schedule for all of our positions. It may help.

answers.author: Diane Bernardo
answers.text:
Finance Director     $95,648 
Senior Accountant    $65,922 
Staff Accountant     $39,166 
Accounts Payable Coordinator     $35,880 
Accounts Payable Clerk   $33,000 
Accounts Receivable Clerk    $37,066 
Payroll Coordinator  $46,176 
Receptionist/Multi Position Clerk    $29,224

author: Jeremy McElwain
text: For municipalities, can anyone share their pay range/scale for all finance positions UNDER the finance director? Please include titles as well, thank you!
title: Salary Survey
